CustomField.description: The system autopopulates this formula field to indicate a fee's amount changed from its original amount relative to the corresponding loan fee. By default, it is blank.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Status__c ,'Inactive'), NOT ISBLANK(LLC_BI__Pricing_Option__c)), IF(ISBLANK(LLC_BI__Fee__c), LLC_BI__Amount__c, IF(LLC_BI__Amount__c=LLC_BI__Fee__r.LLC_BI__Amount__c, NULL, LLC_BI__Amount__c - LLC_BI__Fee__r.LLC_BI__Amount__c)), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to see the change of amount after you edit a fee from its original amount.
CustomField.label: Amount Changed
